name: Morty Mercenaries
description: Rename all mercenaries to Morty, use Evil Morty portrait sprite, Morty's voice for dying, getting hit, giving gear & giving potions and replace the act 2 merc with Kaelan the palace guard.
author: Caedendi, Caleb and Friends

config.name: Replace Sound Effects
config.description: Replace the mercenary's sound effects with Morty's voice.

config.name: Replace Sprites
config.description: Replace the mercenary's portrait sprite with Evil Morty.

config.name: Rename Mercenary
config.description: Rename the mercenary to Morty or the custom name below if set.

config.name: Mercenary Name
config.description: Use a custom name for your Morty. Rename Mercenary must be enabled.

config.name: Enable
config.description: Changes the act 2 mercenary's appearance to that of Kaelan the palace guard.

config.name: Modify Scale
config.description: Changes Chad Morty's size according to the values set below. This is only a visual change and will not impact gameplay (like hitboxes and weapon range). Game default = 0.9, ssipak1103's Merc Kaelan mod has this set to 0.95.
